ygData.subject: Re: Trouble Grouping
ygData.msgSnippet: Lots of people have already answered that they, too, have trouble grouping, especially at your level (I know I do, at 11).  I m lucky enough to have a roomie
ygData.messageBody:
Lots of people have already answered that they, too, have trouble grouping, especially at your level (I know I do, at 11). I'm lucky enough to have a roomie who plays, and we group all the time. However, if I didn't, I'd do what my cleric did (besides really liking my countess <Hail *NOR/!> ), and join a guild. Instant pool of potential party members, hopefully mature enough to know how much good a bard is (Right, Barrd? :) ). (now all I have to do is figure out how to get my bard a NOR <New OutRiders> tag :p )
----- Original Message -----
From: Tanthalias


Lately, I'm having serious trouble finding a group. I'm a level 10 bard on Tarew Marr. Lately I've been hunting in Steamfront Mountains. I'm always looking for a group to hunt mino's (great exp, and their axes sell for 4pp to other players). Whenever I do a "/ooc Level 10 Bard looking for a group" I get no response. Even when there are other level 9-11 players in the area. Are we bards no longer a valuable asset in a group? Has anyone experienced this?
